biotools.summary: Goal is to determine the gene expression profiles of normal, precancer, and cancer cells; resources for human and mouse include ESTs, gene expression patterns, SNPs, cluster assemblies, cytogenetic information, and tools to query and analyze the data.

bioschemas.name: Cancer Genome Anatomy Project
